lead_paragraph: Mack, a defensive end and outside linebacker, became the first player selected for an Associated Press All-Pro team at two spots.

headline.main: Raiders’ Khalil Mack Is Named an All-Pro at Two Positions

snippet: Mack, a defensive end and outside linebacker, became the first player selected for an Associated Press All-Pro team at two spots.
abstract: Oakland Raiders linebacker Khalil Mack makes history for being selected in two positions in 2015 Associated Press All-Pro team.
